desc.p: If set as AUTHORISED this field will create all close out records with status of authorised
One of AUTHORISED or UNAUTHORISED or blank
Key of the associated DX.CLOSEOUT record.
The total lots to be expired for relevent Trans Id
Value should be less than or equal to outstanding open lots
This application is used to manually select trade transactions for expiring of option contracts.
Key consisting of DXCOEXP prefix followd by julian date and a sequence number
A multi valued list of trade transactions to be expired.
Should be a valid DX.TRANSACTION Id.
Should be for a customer on primary side of DX.TRADE
